name: Handcrafted Hawaiian Purse
description:
This purse is handcrafted from authentic Hawaiian fabrics, specifically from the Island of Maui. It was sewn from scratch. It includes beautiful stitching on the inside of the purse as well as out. The body of the purse measures
12 inches in length by 17 inches wide. The handles measure 3/4th of an inch wide. The purse hangs from top-down 22.5 inches.It is very durable and soft in texture. 100% Cotton.
